name: island warlock
dieMessage: a island @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@warlock@c-reset@ lets out a piercing death cry and collapses.

attackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ attempts to grab and throw @player-name@ into some rocks!
The @npc-color-name@ shuffles to avoid @player-name@'s attack before diving directly at @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ looks at @player-name@ with pure hatred before launching another attack!

criticalAttackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ breathes in deeply before chanting unintelligibly toward @player-name@, and then swings at @player-name@ with all of his strength, resulting in a @c-bold@@c-yellow@DEVASTATING@c-reset@ blow to @player-name@!
Catching @player-name@ completely off guard, the @npc-color-name@ strikes a crushing blow against @player-name@, leaving @player-name@ looking completely disoriented and confused!

idleMessages.message: A @npc-color-name@ plods about, minding his own business and surveying his surroundings.
